ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui

Class IconButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.PGraphicsDelegate
      • vialab.SMT.Zone
        • ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui.IconButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, processing.core.PConstants

    public class IconButton
extends vialab.SMT.Zone
    This class creates a simple button widget that has an icon instead of text and may invoke a certain method when pressed. To set the method to invoke use either setStaticPressMethod(String, Class) (for static methods) or setPressMethod(String, Object) (for instance methods).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitry Pyryeskin

    • Method Detail

      • setStaticPressMethod

        public void setStaticPressMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                        java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Set a static method to be invoked when the button is pressed. The method must not have any arguments.
        Parameters:
        methodName - name of the method
        c - class that contains the static method

      • setPressMethod

        public void setPressMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                  java.lang.Object obj)
        Set an instance method to be invoked when the button is pressed. The method must not have any arguments.
        Parameters:
        methodName - name of the method
        obj - object that contains the instance method

      • setColourScheme

        public void setColourScheme(int backgroundColour,
                   int iconColour)
        Set the colour scheme of the button.
        Parameters:
        backgroundColour - colour of the button's background
        iconColour - colour of the button's icon
